name: Dungeon Ascent
description:
This game is all about exploring dungeons, leveling up and trying to get as deep into a dungeon as possible! It's also about upgrading your character and using strategy with your upgrade points in order to make your character as strong as possible!

The game is not even close to being finished so stay tuned for updates! Also, please let me know in the comments if you notice any glitches or problems in the game!

The game does not have a tutorial yet, so check out this video on my YouTube channel to see how to play the game:
